ComicInfo.Summary:
4-Dimensional Vistas Part I: The American soldier confronts the Doctor at gunpoint and reveals that the year is 1963. The Doctor then realizes that he is lost on a parallel earth. After the Doctor nearly drowns, the soldier decides to accompany the Doctor in the TARDIS.
Lunar Lagoon Part 2 of 2: The Doctor attempts to nurses Fuji back to health after the bombing raid, but Fuji staggers off into the forest where he is killed by a shot-down American pilot.
Lunar Lagoon Part 1 of 2: The Doctor's holiday on a South Pacific island in 1983 is interrupted when he is first captured by a Japanese soldier and then bombed by an American fighter plane.
ComicInfo.Title: 4-Dimensional Vistas Part I; Lunar Lagoon Part 2 of 2; Lunar Lagoon Part 1 of 2
